members.name: projectTaskId

members.name: stateCode
members.description: Status of the Project Task

constantValues: Type the name of the custom entity.

members.description: Type the name of the custom entity.

constantValues: Shows the currency associated with the entity.

constantValues: Value of the Actual Cost in base currency.

constantValues: Shows the value of the actual sales in the base currency.

constantValues: Shows whether the aggregation is happening upstream or downstream.

constantValues: Type the project team members that are assigned to task.

constantValues: Shows whether auto scheduling was used for this task.

members.description: The cost estimate contour for the task

constantValues: The id of the project task in MS Project Client.

members.name: numberOfResources

constantValues: Shows the number of resources that are estimated for the task. This is not the number of resources assigned to the task.

members.description: Shows the number of resources that are estimated for the task. This is not the number of resources assigned to the task.

constantValues: Select the summary or parent task in the hierarchy that contains a child task.
